title: [Large-scale] Reflective Feedback-based Beginner Chinese Classifier Learning Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Chinese characters and pronunciation
context.additional_context: Process of maximizing learning effectiveness through experiential contextualization of classification skills via real-life simulations (e.g., markets, restaurants) in VR environments and reflective feedback

learning_goals: Learners must apply the correct usage of 15 basic classifiers with 90% accuracy
Learners must independently analyze error causes when mistakes occur and propose at least three correction strategies
Learners must complete natural conversations of at least five sentences using classifiers in VR simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
